name: ROBLOX Hatsune Miku Purple
description:
A great purple anime theme for the ROBLOX site. Also Blocks ads ufufu.
**I did not make this fully, based off of https://userstyles.org/styles/147960/roblox-anime-sword-art-online
credit to the creator of that theme.**
additional_info: This theme can be edited fairly easily, including the header, navigation bar colour/opacity, the background image, and cursor. Just look through the CSS and edit RGBA, Hex and URLs as you please.
